title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content:
Jozef Supermarkt ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website, use our services, or interact with us.

By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content:
We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our service to you:

Personal Information:
• Name and contact details (email address, phone number)
• Delivery address and preferences
• Order history and preferences
• Payment information (processed securely through Tikkie)

Usage Data:
• Browser type and version
• Pages visited and time spent
• Device information and IP address
• Cookies and similar tracking technologies

We collect this information when you:
• Place orders through our website
• Contact us via WhatsApp, phone, or email
• Visit our website and interact with our content
• Sign up for newsletters or promotions

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content:
We use the collected information for various purposes:

To Provide Our Services:
• Process and fulfill your orders
• Arrange delivery or pickup
• Send order confirmations and updates
• Process payments securely

To Improve Our Services:
• Analyze website usage and performance
• Improve our product offerings
• Enhance customer experience
• Develop new features and services

To Communicate With You:
• Respond to your inquiries and support requests
• Send important service updates
• Provide customer support
• Send promotional offers (with your consent)

To Ensure Security:
• Protect against fraud and abuse
• Maintain the security of our services
• Comply with legal obligations

sharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.content:
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties except in the following circumstances:

Service Providers:
• Delivery partners for order fulfillment
• Payment processors (Tikkie) for secure payments
• IT service providers for website maintenance
• Analytics providers for website improvement

Legal Requirements:
• When required by law or legal process
• To protect our rights and property
• To prevent fraud or security threats
• To comply with regulatory requirements

Business Transfers:
• In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
• Your information may be transferred as part of the business transaction

With Your Consent:
• We may share information with third parties when you explicitly consent
• You can withdraw consent at any time

We ensure that all third parties with whom we share information are bound by appropriate confidentiality and security obligations.

security.title: Data Security
security.content:
We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information:

Technical Measures:
• SSL encryption for all data transmission
• Secure payment processing through Tikkie
• Regular security updates and patches
• Firewall and intrusion detection systems

Organizational Measures:
• Limited access to personal information
• Employee training on data protection
• Regular security audits and assessments
• Incident response procedures

Data Retention:
• We retain your information only as long as necessary
• Order information is kept for legal and business purposes
• You can request deletion of your data
• We securely dispose of data when no longer needed

While we strive to protect your information, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security but we continuously work to improve our security measures.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content:
We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website:

Types of Cookies We Use:
• Essential cookies for website functionality
• Analytics cookies to understand usage patterns
• Preference cookies to remember your settings
• Marketing cookies for personalized content

How We Use Cookies:
• Remember your language preferences
• Analyze website traffic and performance
• Improve website functionality
• Provide personalized content and offers

Managing Cookies:
• You can control cookies through your browser settings
• Disabling cookies may affect website functionality
• We respect your browser's 'Do Not Track' settings

Third-Party Cookies:
• Some cookies are set by third-party services
• These help us provide better services
• We do not control third-party cookie policies

rights.title: Your Rights and Choices
rights.content:
You have certain rights regarding your personal information:

Access and Portability:
• Request access to your personal information
• Receive a copy of your data in a portable format
• Know what information we have about you

Correction and Updates:
• Request correction of inaccurate information
• Update your contact details and preferences
• Ensure your information is current and accurate

Deletion and Restriction:
• Request deletion of your personal information
• Restrict processing of your data
• Withdraw consent for data processing

Objection and Complaints:
• Object to processing of your data
• File complaints with supervisory authorities
• Contact us with privacy concerns

To exercise these rights, contact us via email or phone. We will respond to your request within 30 days.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content:
Our services are not intended for children under the age of 16:

Age Restrictions:
• We do not knowingly collect information from children under 16
• Our website and services are designed for adults
• Children should not use our services without parental consent

Parental Rights:
• Parents can request deletion of their child's information
• We will verify parental identity before processing requests
• Parents can control their child's data usage

If we discover that we have collected information from a child under 16:
• We will delete the information immediately
• We will notify parents if possible
• We will take steps to prevent future collection

If you believe we have collected information from a child under 16, please contact us immediately.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content:
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time:

Notification of Changes:
• We will notify you of significant changes
• Updates will be posted on this page
• The 'Last Updated' date will be revised
• We may send email notifications for major changes

Your Continued Use:
• Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance
• You can review the policy at any time
• Contact us if you have questions about changes

Material Changes:
• Significant changes will be clearly communicated
• You may need to provide new consent
• We will explain the impact of changes

We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices:

Contact Information:
• Email: privacy@jozefmarkt.nl
• Phone: +31 6 24837889
• Address: Jozef Supermarkt, Nieuwe Binnenweg 327 b, 3021 GJ Rotterdam, Netherlands

Response Times:
• We aim to respond within 24-48 hours
• Urgent privacy concerns will be prioritized
• Complex requests may take longer to process

Data Protection Officer:
• For EU-specific privacy concerns
• Contact our designated data protection officer
• Available for GDPR-related inquiries

We are committed to addressing your privacy concerns promptly and thoroughly.
